issue.title: Fix array usage to be compatible with PHP < 5.4
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Since PHP 5.4 it's possible to do that: getSomeArray()[index]

Prior to PHP 5.4, you'll need to use a temporary variable.

Corrections made in :
- /components/com_easysdi_shop/controllers/order.php
- /administrator/components/com_easysdi_shop/layouts/com_eaysdi_shop/order.php


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
